def process_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = ''.join((ch for ch in sentence if ch.isalnum()))

def process_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = ''.join((ch for ch in sentence if ch.isalnum()))
    sentence = sentence[::--1]
    table = str.maketrans('aeiouAEIOU', '1234512345')
    sentence = sentence.translate(table)
